## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fbd6d4cfbb58ae5a7f14b26eb9cf8b4f593b5542ada8603e96b5c6edf7ebe211)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'staging-opbox-web-browser' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
